frontmatter.title: Will a stream work on a mobile website?
frontmatter.metaTitle: Will a stream work on a mobile website?
frontmatter.metaDesc: How reactive looks on a mobile website.

pageProps.content:
Yes, Reactive Live Shopping is optimized to make sure your live selling events are interactive on desktop and mobile websites. Visit [this link](/demo/) on a mobile device to demo the experience on mobile or view the screenshots below of the mobile customer experience.
